body.name: LLEVTIC Computer Speakers, Desktop Speakers with 6 Colorful RGB Lights, Volume Control PC Speakers, USB Powered Gaming Speakers with 3.5mm Aux Cable for PC Monitor Laptop Tablet Phone
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 37 mins
features: 【Full-Range Stereo Sound Quality】Equipped with advanced sound drivers and a full-range 2.0 channel reinforced stereo core, this computer speakers provides the perfect atmosphere for your entertainment activities such as watching movies, gaming, and listening to music. This gaming speakers achieves excellent highs and powerful lows for an immersive audio experience

【RGB Lighting & Touch Control】6 lighting modes - Symphony, Flow, and 4 monochromatic options, are designed for pc speakers, to personalize your desktop and enhance your gaming and auditory experience. The light mode of this gaming speakers can be adjusted through Touch Control , and it can also be turned off .(short press the switch button to turn off)

【Plug and Play】USB powered-Our speakers for gaming monitor are designed for your ease and convenience. Enjoy Plug and Play functionality without the need for any drivers- just plug in the USB powered cable and the 3.5mm audio cable to start enjoying your audio!

【Universal Compatibility】Gaming speakers come equipped with 3.5mm audio and match computers, desktops, PCs, laptops iMac MacBook with a USB C to USB adapter. Suitable for Windows (Vista / 7 / 8 / 10), Mac OS, Chrome OS, Linux, UNIX, and more

【Easy-to-use Volume Control】 separate volume up and volume down buttons make adjusting the volume simple and precise. The cable between the desktop speakers is 43 inches long, and can be placed on either side of the monitor or desktop

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 830 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not too bad.
reviews.reviewText: For the price these are solid speakers. Bass is lacking a bit but what can expect stereo speakers with no subwoofer. Sound is pretty clear and are much better than built in monitor speakers or laptop speakers. With the sales always being ran on the product they are quite affordable. The rgb lights work fine and have a few different modes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very satisfied with my new LED speakers! These speakers are a fantastic addition to my home entertainment setup. The sound quality is superb, delivering crisp and clear audio across all genres of music. The LED lights are not only visually stunning but also add a vibrant and dynamic atmosphere to my room. They sync perfectly with the music, creating a mesmerizing light show that elevates the entire listening experience. The build quality is top-notch, and they are incredibly easy to set up and use. What's even more impressive is that they offer fantastic value for the price. These speakers have exceeded my expectations and brought a whole new dimension to my music and movie nights. I couldn't be happier with this purchase – 5 stars all the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, Price, Easy-to-use
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these to use with my desktop computer so I could play all the music files I have collected over the years. Easy setup out of the box. Two connectors plug in to the PC. One to the speaker jack and one to a USB port. They operate off and on with the computer power switch. No electrical plug needed. A button on one of the speakers changes the multi light patterns or you may turn off the light display. They produce a good quality sound at a very reasonable price. Over all a very good product. I am very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great For School Use
reviews.reviewText: We homeschool, and the kids' laptop sound is inadequate, so we purchased this set of speakers to connect to them because we watch a lot of movies, lessons, and other online content that requires sound. The speakers are plug-and-play devices, making them easy to set up and use.The sound is clear, and the volume is much louder now, so the kids can hear much better. I can quickly adjust the volume as needed with little effort. I especially like the LED lighting in them because it makes everything better. They are fairly priced, functional, stylish, and do the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little desktop speakers!
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely thrilled with these RGB desktop computer speakers! Not only do they look amazing with the vibrant RGB lights, but they also deliver top-notch sound quality. I was blown away by how clear and crisp the audio is, especially considering the affordable price point.One thing that really impressed me is how little power these speakers require to produce such great sound. Despite their compact size, they pack a punch and are perfect for enhancing my gaming and movie-watching experience.Overall, I couldn't be happier with my purchase. These RGB desktop computer speakers offer fantastic value for money and there aren't many options out there that can compete with their performance. If you're looking for budget-friendly speakers that deliver on both aesthetics and sound quality, look no further!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ordered these for my boyfriend due to him getting a new gaming system. These speakers were not only a great price but have great sound quality. There's no static or muffled sound coming thru which I love! The colors are a great added bonus and I also love that the top can be touched to change the colors on the speakers with ease. Overall very satisfied with this product and would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: These speakers were very reasonably priced so I decided to purchase them. They work well, sound is much better than what was coming from the pc. I do not know how good they would be for gaming, but they work well for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are a good deal for the price range. I like to watch videos, listen to live animal cams, and listen to police scanner. These work great for those things without breaking the bank. If you want really high quality, you have to spend a bit more than I am willing to. I wish the default setting was a bit higher so I didn't have to adjust at the speaker, just at pc but that really is not that inconvenient just an observation. I didn't give 5 stars because we all know if you spend more there is better out there but these are a great bargain and sound good.

Buscaba unas bocinas para mi monitor y realmente estás bocinas son excelentes. Tienen un buen sonido sin importar a qué volumen las coloques y si te gustan las luces RGB, tiene una buena variedad para cumplir con ese aspecto (e igualmente si no te gustan, pueden apagarse)Si buscas algo bueno a un precio accesible, estás pueden ser las que requieres.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy, just plug in the usb to the laptop or pc, and the speaker jack in the head phones, but wait for verification to Pop in if using win11, don't verify for headphones, use the drop down arrow, on the verification box, and verify speakers.The controls are easy, switch the speakers on from the bottom button on the panel of the speaker, it uses the push/click system the other 2 buttons are the volume up or down, the lights can be switched off by a single click on the bottom button, the sound is clear and not distorted, but the the MP3 song your playing has to be good or perfect in sound quality.
